description: How potential customers discover and enter the pipeline
key_questions: How do leads find you?|What channels generate leads?|How many leads per week?|What's the cost per lead?|What percentage convert?
common_bottlenecks: No tracking|Manual outreach only|No follow-up system|Inconsistent messaging

description: From first contact through closing the deal
key_questions: What happens after first contact?|How many touches to close?|What's your close rate?|Who runs the sales call?|What tools do you use?
common_bottlenecks: No CRM|Manual follow-ups|No proposal template|Long sales cycle|No pipeline visibility

description: Getting new clients set up and started
key_questions: What happens after they sign?|What information do you collect?|How long until they're active?|Who owns onboarding?
common_bottlenecks: Manual setup|No welcome sequence|Missing intake forms|Unclear handoffs

description: How you actually deliver the core service or product
key_questions: What are the steps to deliver?|Who does what?|What tools are used?|What's the quality check?
common_bottlenecks: Founder bottleneck|No SOPs|Inconsistent quality|No project management

description: How you keep clients informed and engaged
key_questions: How often do you update clients?|What channels?|Who manages communication?|How do you handle complaints?
common_bottlenecks: Ad-hoc updates|No status reports|Reactive only|No feedback loop

description: How you bill and collect payment
key_questions: When do you invoice?|What payment terms?|How do you track AR?|What's your collection process?
common_bottlenecks: Manual invoicing|Late payments|No reminders|No payment tracking

description: How projects are planned tracked and delivered
key_questions: What PM tools do you use?|How do you track progress?|What are your milestones?|How do you handle scope creep?
common_bottlenecks: No PM tool|No milestone tracking|Scope creep|No resource planning

description: How the team communicates and coordinates
key_questions: What tools for internal comms?|How often do you meet?|How are decisions documented?|How are tasks assigned?
common_bottlenecks: Too many tools|No meeting cadence|Lost context|Undocumented decisions

description: How knowledge is captured and shared
key_questions: Where do you store docs?|Who creates documentation?|How do you find information?|What's documented vs in heads?
common_bottlenecks: Nothing documented|Scattered across tools|Outdated docs|Tribal knowledge

description: How you ensure work meets standards
key_questions: What are your quality standards?|Who reviews work?|What's your testing process?|How do you handle defects?
common_bottlenecks: No QA process|No review step|Ad-hoc testing|No acceptance criteria

description: How you measure and report on business performance
key_questions: What metrics do you track?|How often do you review?|What tools for reporting?|Who sees the reports?
common_bottlenecks: No metrics|Manual reporting|No dashboards|Vanity metrics only

description: How you recruit evaluate and manage team members
key_questions: How do you find candidates?|What's your interview process?|How do you evaluate fit?|How do you onboard new team?
common_bottlenecks: No hiring process|No evaluation criteria|No onboarding|No performance reviews

description: How money is tracked and managed
key_questions: Who does bookkeeping?|What accounting software?|How do you track expenses?|How do you forecast?
common_bottlenecks: Manual bookkeeping|No accounting software|No expense tracking|No cash flow visibility

description: How contracts and legal requirements are handled
key_questions: Who handles contracts?|What templates do you use?|How do you ensure compliance?|Where are contracts stored?
common_bottlenecks: No contract templates|No legal review|Compliance gaps|Scattered documents

description: How time and appointments are managed
key_questions: How do clients book time?|How do you manage your calendar?|How do you avoid conflicts?|What scheduling tools?
common_bottlenecks: Manual scheduling|No booking tool|Double bookings|No buffer time

description: What technology stack powers the business
key_questions: What tools do you use daily?|How do they connect?|What's manual between tools?|What do you wish was automated?
common_bottlenecks: Disconnected systems|Manual data entry|No integrations|Tool sprawl

description: How business data is stored organized and protected
key_questions: Where is your data?|How is it backed up?|Who has access?|How do you handle sensitive data?
common_bottlenecks: Data in multiple places|No backups|No access controls|No data strategy
